case.title: Handsome, outgoing,smart? - 42 (Suffolk)
case.text:
Mr Right? - 40 (LI) Looking to meet an man who is single,separated or divorced.
Attractive w/f, outgoing, educated,40 y/o separated Mom trying to meet someone similar.
The ideal guy would be w/m,handsome, educated, not looking for anything to serious, someone to enjoy some time with.
Drop a note with a pic and lets see if there's a connection.
